plot: Devalos takes ill, the home invasions continue but Allison can't figure things out, and Joe is less than pleased by Clay Bicks' presence.

Alison and Joe have to deal with Bridgette and her dreams that are becoming more and more violent and she refuses to sleep. When a homeowner kills the house invaders, Alison develops a theory that may explain the link between the woman in the minivan and exactly what the gunmen were up to. DA Devalos is hospitalized when he wakes up one morning to find that he is completely blind. Det. Scanlon begins to doubt that he and Deputy Mayor Lynn DiNovi have a future together. Joe is completely fed up with the ghostly presence of Alison's old boyfriend and lets him know that he is not welcome.—garykmcd
